```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
```

# MEGAN OGs
```{r}
megan <- read.delim("MEGAN_outputs/737NSvsWS_EGGNOGcount.csv", header = FALSE, comment.char = "#",
                    stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
    select(V1) %>%
    mutate(V1 = str_replace(V1, "^(ENOG|COG)([A-Z0-9]*)\\s*.*$", "\\2")) %>%
    unique()
```

# eggNOG OGs
```{r}
eggnog <- read.delim("eggnogmap_results/hmm_annotations.tabular", header = F) %>%
    select(V11) %>%
    mutate(V11 = str_split(V11, "\\|", simplify = TRUE)[, 1]) %>%
    unique()
```

# Euler diagram
```{r}
library(eulerr)
plot(euler(list("megan" = megan$V1, "eggnog" = eggnog$V11)))
```

Problem - they're in different naming schemes!
